thread.title: Moderate mag. 4.0 earthquake - North Pacific Ocean, 77 km south of Coalcoman de Vazquez Pallares, Mexico, on Wednesday, Aug 27, 2025, at 08:04 pm (Mazatlan time)

author: @EQAlerts
title: Moderate mag. 4.0 earthquake - North Pacific Ocean, 77 km south of Coalcoman de Vazquez Pallares, Mexico, on Wednesday, Aug 27, 2025, at 08:04 pm (Mazatlan time)
text:
A moderate magnitude 4.0 earthquake occurred in the North Pacific Ocean near the coast of Estado de Michoacan de Ocampo State, Mexico, in the evening of Wednesday, Aug 27, 2025 at 8.04 pm local time (America/Mazatlan GMT -7). The quake had a very shallow depth of 11 km (7 mi) and was not felt (or at least not reported so).
